medical_history.chief_complaint: Recurrent episodes of abnormal behavior associated with Kleine-Levin syndrome.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Ms. A, a 53-year-old woman, experienced her first episode at this age, characterized by euphoric mood, reduced sleep, sexually provocative behavior, and hypersomnolence lasting approximately four weeks. The episodes of behavior included complaints of harassment, and autonomic dysfunction occurred only during these episodes, lasting 5-15 minutes.
medical_history.past_medical_history: No previous psychiatric or medical history.
medical_history.family_history: No family history suggesting affective or psychotic illness.
